thread.title: Historic mansion for sale for $30K, must be relocated
thread.title_full: Historic mansion for sale for $30K, must be relocated

author: The Associated Press
title: Historic mansion for sale for $30K, must be relocated
text:
Home / Nation & World / Historic mansion for sale for $30K, must be relocated Historic mansion for sale for $30K, must be relocated By: The Associated Press October 21, 2015 4:23 pm 0 
MANCHESTER, N.H. â€” A historic mansion that was donated to the Catholic Diocese of Manchester and once housed a bishop has been put on the market for a fraction of its assessed property value. 
WMUR-TV reports the former George B. Chandler home has 20 bedrooms and seven baths and is listed for sale at less than $30,000. The house was assessed at more than $600,000. 
But the entire 10,000 square foot mansion must be relocated to make way for a parking lot for the St. Hedwig parish next door. 
A real estate agent responsible for the listing estimated moving the home locally could cost up to $300,000. He says calls have come in from around the country since the listing went up Sunday night. Share this:
